title: Slow Cooker Pork Chops
description: If you've never had pork chops from a slow cooker before, this is the recipe to try. Just 5 ingredients, hardly any work, and you get tender and delicious results.

title: Creamy Ranch Pork Chops & Rice
description: Campbell's Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup and ranch salad dressing combine to make a perfectly seasoned sauce to serve over golden, juicy pork chops and rice.

title: Slow Cooker Kielbasa with Apples, Onions and Sauerkraut
description: Try this easy-to-make recipe featuring spicy kielbasa, tangy sauerkraut and sweet apples.

title: Tasty 2-Step Pork Chops
description: Here's a great-tasting, family-friendly dish that features sawtayed pork chops in a creamy mushroom sauce. And it's on the table in 25 minutes!

title: Speedy Sausage Rigatoni
description: Just 4 ingredients combine for a simple skillet dish that's loaded with fabulous flavor. Sawtayed sweet Italian sausage and sliced zucchini combine with portobello mushroom soup and cooked pasta for a delicious meal that's an absolute winner!

title: Pork Chops & Stuffing Bake
description: This one-dish recipe couldn't be easier to make. And since it features juicy pork chops atop cornbread stuffing, it's sure to be a hit with your family too.

title: Pork Chops and Mustard Onion Gravy
description: Sawtayed boneless pork chops are a great dinner option. Here, we add an easy to make mustard-onion gravy that adds terrific flavor to both the chops and the accompanying mashed potatoes.

title: Sweet Onion Pork Medallions
description: Sawtayed pork medallions simmer in an irresistible sauce made with sweet onion soup, honey and Dee-zhawn-style mustard. Serve them with mashed potatoes for a restaurant quality meal that's guaranteed to impress.

title: Three Cheese & Spicy Sausage Baked Rigatoni
description: Rigatoni, sawtayed onion and three cheeses are mixed together with a jarred spicy Italian sauce that comes out of the oven hot and bubbly, and absolutely delicious!

title: Country Scalloped Potatoes
description: Ordinary scalloped potatoes become extraordinary when they're made with ham, onion and a creamy cheese sauce. They make an appetizing addition to just about any meal.

title: Gumbo with Andouille Sausage
description: One taste of this fabulous gumbo and you'll think you're in New Orleans! The Cajun flavor infused broth adds incredible taste to the sausage, chicken and vegetables. Serve this at your next party for an impressive dish that's sure to be a hit with your guests!

title: Pennsylvania Dutch Ham & Noodle Casserole
description: Sure to become a family favorite, this quick cooking casserole combines cubed cooked ham, noodles and tender onions blended with a creamy cheesy sauce.

title: Pork Chop & Spanish Rice Bake
description: It couldn't be easier to get an enjoyable dinner on the table. Simply combine the ingredients in a baking dish and pop the dish in the oven.  In less than an hour, you have a savory pork chop and rice dinner.

title: Hot Sausage Casserole
description: This sausage and rice casserole is seasoned with onions, green peppers and a creamy sauce. When you're in the mood for something especially tasty, give this dish a try!

title: Sausage-Stuffed Green Peppers
description: A savory combination of sweet Italian sausage, onion, oregano, and mozzarella cheese is tucked into tender green peppers and topped with tomato sauce for an easy-to-make version of this hearty classic.

title: Slow-Cooked Pulled Pork Sandwiches
description: These fabulous sandwiches feature pork shoulder that is slow-cooked in a scrumptious, sweet and tangy sauce to be served on sandwich buns.

title: Hearty Sausage & Rice Casserole
description: Come in from the cold and enjoy this flavorful sausage, vegetable and rice casserole that's easy to put together and even better to eat!

title: Autumn Pork Chops
description: We've created this delectable recipe for those nights when you need to get dinner on the table fast.  It features browned pork chops simmered in a tangy, sweet sauce that's been seasoned with mustard, apple juice and honey.

title: Slow Cooker Jambalaya
description: This delectable, slow-cooked version of a traditional New Orleans-style dish features chicken, kielbasa and shrimp in a bed of rice that's been seasoned with Creole seasoning, green pepper, celery and diced tomato.

title: Slow-Cooked Apricot Glazed Pork Roast
description: Pork roast slow-cooks to tenderness under a tangy glaze of apricot preserves, mustard, and onion. This is a dish worth waiting for!

title: Orange Pork Tenderloins with Caramelized Onions
description: Sweet meets heat in this delectable skillet tenderloin that's ready to serve in just 45 minutes! Give it a try. It's really good!

title: Slow Cooker Hearty Mixed Bean Stew with Sausage
description: Here's a hearty stew to feed a hungry crowd. It features a colorful array of beans simmering with sausage and chicken broth, that slow cooks for hours, leaving you free to enjoy the day.

title: Savory Sausage & Rice Skillet
description: This one-skillet supper features all the mouthwatering flavors of sausage and peppers, served on a flavorful bed of brown and wild rice. Plus, clean-up is a breeze.

title: Chicken Sausage with Farfalle Alfredo
description: Farfalle pasta, chicken sausage, onion and tomatoes are tossed in a creamy basil pesto Alfredo sauce. The result is a fabulous dish that's guaranteed to be a real crowd-pleaser!

title: Cheddar Penne with Sausage & Peppers
description: This simple skillet dish combines mac and cheese with sausage and peppers to make a family-favorite dish that's on the table in less than 45 minutes!

title: Slow Cooker Golden Mushroom Pork & Apples
description: Put this together in your slow cooker before work and you will come home to a delicious pork dish loaded with flavor. Boneless pork chops, golden mushroom soup, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire, onions and apple slices slow cook to perfection in a sweet and savory sauce that everyone will enjoy. Give it a try, this recipe is a definite keeper!

title: Polynesian Pork Chops
description: Enjoy tropical flavors any time of year with this savory skillet dish featuring tender pork chops in a flavorful pineapple-soy-mushroom sauce.

title: Mushroom-Garlic Pork Chops
description: This favorite pork chop dish, served over egg noodles with a tasty sauce is just like mom used to make. Only quicker and easier! It's the perfect weeknight dinner.

title: Hawaiian Ham & Pineapple Pizza
description: This island-inspired pizza is super easy to prepare but packs a flavorful punch! Naan flatbread is topped with a fruity salsa, diced ham, mozzarella cheese and green onion for a perfectly delicious pizza that will steal the show.

title: Herbed Pork Roast & Creamy Mushroom Gravy
description: We love this recipe because it's easy, elegant and simply delicious!

title: Quick Glazed Pork & Rice Skillet
description: This speedy skillet dish features browned boneless pork chops and rice simmered in an easy-to-make sweet and sour sauce.

title: Slow Cooker Fall Harvest Pork Stew
description: Slow cooking ensures meltingly tender results in this rich and satisfying pork stew packed with apples, butternut squash and parsnips. It's delish!

title: Slow-Cooked Pulled Pork Sliders
description: Looking for the perfect addition to a relaxed menu? Try these mouthwateringly delicious pulled pork sliders. The slow cooker does the work for you. So when it's meal time or party time, you can join the fun!

title: Creamy Pork Sawtay
description: Strips of pork loin, celery and onion are coated in a creamy sauce and served over a bed of rice for this satisfying family supper that's ready in just 35 minutes.

title: Pork with Mushroom Dee-zhawn Sauce
description: White wine and mustard season a creamy sauce for topping tender, golden pork chops. And they're ready in less than 40 minutes.

title: Skillet Pork Chops & Beans
description: This 30-minute dish uses prepared pork and beans, together with celery, onion and brown sugar to add flavor and substance to sawtayed pork chops.

title: Pork Chops with Creamy Onion Sauce
description: Four ingredients and twenty-five minutes are all you need to make these moist and flavorful pork chops that the whole family is sure to love.

title: Louisiana-Style Chicken, Sausage & Shrimp Skillet
description: This Louisiana Creole-inspired dish is hearty and loaded with fantastic flavor. Chicken, sausage, shrimp and fresh veggies are simmered in a savory tomato soup mixture. Wow your family by serving it tonight for dinner, it's sure to earn rave reviews!

title: Herbed Pork Chops in Mushroom Sauce
description: Golden brown, seasoned pork chops simmer with onion in a creamy mushroom sauce and are served over hot cooked rice.
